job_responsibilities.title: E-commerce Platform Development
job_responsibilities.content: Developed and managed the Tradiecart e-commerce platform. Developed high impact features including a multi carrier shipping automation engine and data analysis pipelines on AWS. Simultaneously improved UX and sales capabilities by delivering scalable enhancements, such as dynamic product bundling and recommendation interfaces. Handled end to end development, deployment and server management.

job_responsibilities.title: AI Agents & MCP Server
job_responsibilities.content: Developed technical and sales AI agents powered with a RAG pipeline and a MCP server to streamline product information retrieval and simplify the ordering process through a chat based UI seamlessly integrated with the TradieCart website.

job_responsibilities.title: Voice Agent
job_responsibilities.content: Orchestrated and deployed an AI voice agent to manage customer queries using MCP and integrated assistant tools, enabling seamless handoff to human agents for complex interactions and significantly reducing human effort in customer call handling.

job_responsibilities.title: Container-Based Packing System
job_responsibilities.content: Developed a shipping container based packing system to replace the traditional eCommerce cart, featuring a drag and drop UI that improved customization, transparency, and packing efficiency.

job_responsibilities.title: Doocan Website
job_responsibilities.content: Developed the cscart based Doocan website, hosted on AWS EC2 with S3 integration. Enhanced customer engagement and expanded market reach through improved website functionality and user experience.

job_responsibilities.title: AI Furniture Image Generation Tool
job_responsibilities.content: Developed an AI tool for generating furniture images from user prompts, by fine tuning an image generation model wrapped in a Python Flask API.

job_responsibilities.title: Data Engineer (Python) - McKinsey & Company
job_responsibilities.content: Worked as a Data Engineer (Python) with McKinsey & Company to develop a supply chain and logistics analytics platform. Designed and implemented data transformation workflows and exposed them via Flask based APIs.

job_responsibilities.title: Automated Data Pipeline
job_responsibilities.content: Automated a manual Alteryx-based data transformation pipeline using Python and PostgreSQL, eliminating human errors, reducing processing time, and saving approximately $1,000 per month per client in licensing costs.

job_responsibilities.title: Inventory Management UI
job_responsibilities.content: Developed the front-end of a full-fledged Inventory Management application using React.js, implementing context and state management for efficient data handling. Integrated libraries such as CryptoJS for secure data processing and Highcharts for interactive data visualizations.

work.info_text: Worked as a full stack web developer to revamp company's website which was outdated in multiple areas. We created a new website using Django and modern frontend libraries like Bootstrap (css) and Jquery (js). I was also responsible to deploy the website on Heroku cloud.

job_responsibilities.title: E-learning Platform Development
job_responsibilities.content: Collaborated on development of olcademyâ€™s e-learning platform using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP, improving accessibility and user experience across devices.

projects.title: MCP Lab
projects.content: Built a platform for managing and testing multiple MCP servers, allowing users to register servers with custom headers, analyze available tools, and interact via manual calls or LLM powered chat using a bring your own key model. Designed to help teams streamline MCP server development workflows and accelerate iterations.

projects.title: Medical Flora Chatbot
projects.content: Developed an AWS Bedrock based chatbot for research faculty at RMIT. This chatbot enables users to explore relationships between flora, their medicinal properties, and chemical compositions using custom datasets. Implemented multi-step LLM tool invocations with Python scripting to analyze multiple CSV files dynamically.

projects.title: Alumni System API
projects.content: API to facilitate sharing of alumni documents like certificates and transcripts. Implemented token based authentication and authorization using FastAPI, Dynamodb database, s3 file storage and retrieval and also configurable with docker.

Leadership: Web master at ACM SAKEC (college committee). Lead the team to revamp a static website into dynamic by adding databases and dashboards.
Communication: Speaker at a 2 day Django + Python Workshop. Discussed basic concepts of Python as well as Web Development including MVC pattern web apps, APIs, HTTP protocal and much more.
